startGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Starts the game by setting the game state to IN_GAME, arranging the Game model for the first round according to Eriantys' rules and broadcasting a proper message to all the participant players.
startGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Fills the players' halls with the right amount of students and shuffles the players' order at the beginning of the match, in order to start the game properly.
startGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameExpertMode
Fills the players' halls with the right amount of students and shuffles the players' order at the beginning of the match, in order to start the game properly (just as the overridden method does).
